Name: BoreMax
Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Resistance: -75%

Optimal Charge Rate: -50%
Overcharge Rate: +50%

Break apart tough deposits with help from the BoreMax. Thermyte Concern designed this powerful mining accessory to dramatically reduce a deposit's resistance, though that extra energy does affect both the overcharge and optimal charge rate.
